docs.snippet: The Tribune Company is following in the footsteps of Time Warner and News Corporation as the trend of spinning off print publications into separate companies continues....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Tribune Company is following in the footsteps of Time Warner and News Corporation as the trend of spinning off print publications into separate companies continues.
docs.abstract: Tribune Co is dividing itself into separate broadcast and publishing companies to cut taxes; firm is following in footsteps of Time Warner and News Corp

headline.main: To Cut Taxes, Tribune Is to Split Into Broadcasting and Publishing Units
headline.print_headline: To Cut Taxes, Tribune Is to Split Into Broadcasting and Publishing Units

byline.original: By CHRISTINE HAUGHNEY and DAVID CARR
